banner.description:
Full-Stack Software Developer With 2+ Years
Of Professional Experience.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Eric, I’m an organized, detail-oriented, self-motivated, dedicated professional, and experienced developer with a passion for developing innovative programs that expedite the efficiency and effectiveness of organization success. After discovering my passion for web development, I couldn’t get enough. I made websites for friends and family, worked with a local business, and hired myself out as a freelancer. I’m looking forward to bringing that passion to a full-time role. If you have a project that you want to get started or think you need my help with something, then get in touch.

expertise.subtitle: I can help you bring your product to life - whether it's a Minimum Viable Product(MVP), UX/UI Services or API integration.

items.title: Front-End
items.description: As a javascript developer, I have experience in HTML5 and CSS3 techniques working with jQuery or more advanced javascript MVC frameworks such as React.

items.title: Back-End
items.description: Utilising backend frameworks such as rails or nodejs, I've written services supporting thousands of users, including REST APIs, e-learning applications and more.

items.title: Remote Working
items.description: As a full-stack software developer, I have 2+ years of experience in working remotely

description: Designed and Implemented a new ORM framework to help our devs team to execute complicated database queries fast and easy.
Reviewed, monitored, and repaired any changed code for quality, adherence to standards, and potential performance effects on compatible systems.
Front-end development with React, Redux, SASS, and APIs integration.
Designed, managed, and updated web applications for various departments in the organization.
Established development standards to facilitate high-quality code and leverage the latest innovations in technology.
Customized systems for the development of software application tools and architecture.
The team reached a high performance using SCRUM, Continuous Integration, automated tests, and English as the main language.
I've written services supporting thousands of users, including REST APIs, e-learning applications and more.

recommendations.message: I’ve had the pleasure of knowing Eric, He wasn't just a teammate but also a great friend during the Software development journey at Microverse Remote pair-programming session. I was so impressed by his style of learning, adapting knowledge quickly, Researching skills, and share the knowledge with others. He was very professional and always ready for new responsibilities which is something desired by any professional. He will be a great asset and I recommend Eric.

Eric has consistently been a great contributor to our team. In addition to general charisma and positivity, he's not afraid to speak up and do what needs to be done to achieve his goals. Issues and blockers he sets his mind to are sure to be solved quickly and efficiently! Self-starter and go-getter all around. Never denied taking an extra mile for getting the result. Quick problem-solver with strong programming skills, he would be definitely a great asset for any development team.

I have had the honor of working with Eric several times on different projects, And I can say without a doubt that he is one of the very best engineers out there. He is a very flexible and practical person and holds a deep understanding of the different technologies that surround him. He is a focused person and very strong-willed. He is an excellent engineer, mentor, teacher, and friend.

statements.return: ["Web Development", "Mobile App Development", " API Integration","Remote Working"]
